creator: Cheerio Team
descriptionHtml:
Cheerio is a social networking platform that helps its users find, interact and socialise with people that match their vibe. You can not only discuss common interests, but also play party games, share a gift and have a ball of a time, from the comfort of your couch. Users have been known to redeem their popularity on Cheerio for an assortment of real world goodies. With Cheerio, good company and great conversations are just a tap away.

You can also add your own friends to the party to double the fun.

Play Never Have I ever, Trivia, Heads up and more games.
Share drink credits with each other, on the go!
Get 25 free drinks credit to start with!
descriptionShort: Cheerio - Make new friends, party and play games

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update you can play all of our games, be it Trivia, Never have I ever, Would you rather or Heads up, we’ve got it all.

And the best part is you can play these games both in multiplayer and single player modes.

As you keep winning and beating high scores, you’ll level up and be able to redeem your credits for Amazon and Swiggy coupons!

We have also improved our video stability and added some UI fixes!

Dive in and let us know in the reviews your feedback of this release! Cheerio! 👋

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New UI Experience for our users and major bug fixes on live table video calls.

title: Cheerio - Game, Chat, Friends

creator: Cheerio Social
descriptionHtml:
With Cheerio you can not only play games on video call or chat with your existing friends but also discover new people via chat or video call.

Once you take a quick personality test and tell us about your interests, we are ready to create an immersive experience for you and your friends, over voice, video and chat.

You can also discover new people and make friends based on your common interests, location, personality and mood.

We understand that conversations need icebreakers, and that is why we have Games such as Never Have I Ever, Trivia, Heads Up and Would you rather, to get you social in no time.

What's craziest is you get 50 Cheerio credits to start with and as you engage in conversations with people you are rewarded with more and more credits, that can be redeemed for Amazon and swiggy coupons, as well as cashbacks.

So here's a social network that's a lot more engaging than any of our competitors and it literally pays to be on Cheerio!

Download Now and have the time of your life, from the comfort of your couch.
descriptionShort: Play games, video call or chat, discover interesting people, find a community.
title: Cheerio - Games, Chat, Friends

creator: Cheerio Social
descriptionHtml:
Cheerio is a community and people discovery app that helps you find events, activities and discussions that match your interests.

Once you create your account and share your interests with us we start suggesting relevant communities in your location. Whether you are a casual cricketer looking for a bunch of guys to play with or a baking enthusiast looking for recipes for Cheesecakes, we have just the right communities for you.

If you are extroverted enough, you can skip the community route and directly ping people who match your interests. More than 200 people met through Cheerio in Bangalore alone last month.


So give up that couch potato life, find people and communities around you and meetup, IRL!
descriptionShort: Discover people & communities around you. Deep dive into any discussion!

title: Cheerio: Find Your Tribe

creator: Cheerio Social
descriptionHtml:
At Cheerio, we empower creators to build, engage, and monetize their communities through our end-to-end solutions across the community building lifecycle.

Whether you’re a tutor looking to connect directly with your students, a talented chef looking to monetize your deliciously innovative recipes, or a stock expert sharing today's top stock picks for a fee, we have got you covered. We want you to have complete access, control, and autonomy over your growing community!

While creators help grow our communities, users are the essence of Cheerio and can discover communities based on their interests in less than 10 seconds of creating their profile on Cheerio.

Our USP and most loved feature is the payment collection tool that helps experts monetise their skills by creating a payment link in less than 30 seconds and getting settlements within 24 hours.

Creators can monetise any content as long as it can be hosted on a link, it could be an exclusive telegram or whatsapp group, a stock due diligence PDF, an audio or a video file hosted on google drive or even a zoom or google meet workshop link! Monetising your expertise has never been easier.

Apart from payments collection here are a few of our unique features:

1. Innovative engagement tools such as polls, location filters and event scheduling to streamline offline & in-person group meetups!
2. Creators own their audience’s SMS, WhatsApp and Email lists on Cheerio, hence possessing true ownership of their community. They can even send drip communication across all of these channels. Say goodbye to the days of people leaving your community, you'll always have a way to reach to them.
3. Moderated safe-spaces for interest & support groups with a focus on helping users engage in local interest-based communities.
4. Providing convenient access to social support systems for any life situations or interests users may find themselves associated with.

So what are you still doing here? Regardless of whether you are a creator or an expert or a user.

Join Cheerio now and find that sense of belonging you want and deserve, as a bonus monetise your expertise and earn CheerioCoins 😁
descriptionShort: SaaS for Creators & experts to build, engage & monetise their communities

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Cheerio Paid content is now live for all creators
Updated Coin Mining rate for Admins and Creators
Minor UI Bug Fixes
Major White UI and UX update <3

title: Cheerio: Build, engage, earn

creator: Cheerio Social
descriptionHtml:
•Increase repeat sales using Cheerio's cloud based CRM by upto 56%
•Use Cheerio to keep in touch with your customers over email, sms & whatsapp.
•It's extremely simple to use and no coding or tech integrations are needed.
•Compared to other CRMs or marketing automation tools Cheerio costs 1/10th and is extremely affordable
•Choose from best in class messaging, email and sms templates to send out offers, discounts, announce a new product or a new course through Cheerio
•Best in class analytics on campaigns
•Expert support from Cheerio's marketing wizards!

All you need to do is connect your database to Cheerio CRM or upload a customer excel/csv file and you are ready to reach out to your customers.

Drive repeat sales from our easy to customise and already approved messaging templates which are proven to convert.

Try Cheerio now!
descriptionShort: CRM SaaS:No code, affordable SMS, Whatsapp & Email automation for small business
